code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CategoryPage=_ref=>{let{handleClick}=_ref;const{categoryName}=useParams();const[categoryBlogs,setCategoryBlogs]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{fetch("/categories/".concat(categoryName)).then(resp=>resp.json()).then(data=>setCategoryBlogs(data));},[categoryName]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"ui centered card ",style:{width:'700px',marginTop:"30px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:[categoryName," Category"]}),categoryBlogs?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:categoryBlogs.map(blog=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:blog.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"ui Big centered image",children:blog.images.map((image,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"blog-image",src:image.file_path,alt:"".concat(index+1)},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:blog.excerpt}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleClick(blog.id),className:"mini ui teal button",children:"Read More"})})]},blog.id))}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."})]});};export default CategoryPage;
